name: Zombitatos the end of the Pc master race
description: Welcome to the apocalyptic world of Zombitatos! You are going to play as 2 survivors in this comedy point and click adventure! There are puzzle elements to keep your brain entertain!, lots of easter eggs, a unique style of humor, and an interactive storyline! Are you ready to survive?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Xp / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: *It can work on almost any pc*
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows  Xp / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 2 GB available space

This is one of the worst games I have ever played. The 'developers' put forth absolutely no effort with this project; incidentally I'm reasonably sure this is just a highschool project that someone somehow forced through greenlight. The FMV scenes are cringeworthy and devoid of humor and the game's 'plot' is mindless. Even if it were free I couldn't recommend it.          YouTube™ Video:  Let's Play Zombitatos
